changeSet.sql: CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW v_activity_list AS SELECT rep.source AS communication_channel, rep.type_code AS report_type, fa.type_code AS activity_type, fluxreport.purpose_code, fa.calculated_start_time as start_date, delperiod.end_date, cperson.title, cperson.given_name, cperson.middle_name,cperson.family_name,cperson.family_name_prefix, cperson.name_suffix, cperson.alias FROM activity.activity_fishing_activity fa left join activity.activity_fa_report_document rep on rep.id = fa.fa_report_document_id left join activity.activity_flux_report_document fluxreport on fluxreport.id = rep.flux_report_document_id left join activity.activity_delimited_period delperiod on delperiod.fishing_activity_id = fa.id left join activity.activity_vessel_transport_means vtm on vtm.fishing_activity_id = fa.id left join activity.activity_contact_party cparty on cparty.vessel_transport_means_id = vtm.id left join activity.activity_contact_person cperson on cparty.contact_person_id = vtm.id;
